author: Jing Ling
name: CRUD Items
description: A template for creating CRUD items.
symbols/prefix/description: The prefix of the project name.
symbols/entity-key-type/description: The key type of the entity.
symbols/core/description: The project name without the prefix that entities are stored in.
symbols/storage/description: The project name without the prefix that DbContext is stored in.
symbols/infrastructure/description: The project name without the prefix that infrastructure services are stored in.
symbols/web/description: The project name without the prefix that controllers are stored in.
symbols/disable-controller/description: Disables the controller from being generated.
